overview: Have you ever fantasized that for one moment you could be someone else just so you could act out your utmost sexual desires and not have to succumb to the consequences for your actions afterwards? Join Kaylani and a bevy of the adult industry's top stars, as they bring this scenario to life and take the phrase 'acting out your fantasies' to a whole new level.My Secret Life, erotic secrets exposed...
tagline: These secrets are meant to arouse your interest while stirring up your curiousity. Can you handle this Love Chain?
title: Intrigue
